items.text: length ball, punched towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ervine, no run

items.text: brings out the reverse sweep and beats the man at short third man for a much-needed boundary
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ervine, FOUR runs

items.text: fuller on stumps, driven towards long-on

bowls him with a beauty! Bring out the Nagin dance celebrations. It was a tad fuller, Raza played back but the ball turned sharply to beat the outside edge and hit the off stump. A dream delivery for any left-arm bowler
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, OUT

dismissal.text: Sikandar Raza  b Nazmul Islam 7 (22b 0x4 0x6) SR: 31.81

items.preText: Sean Williams is the new man in
items.text: length ball, around middle and off, pushed towards mid-on
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ervine, no run

items.text: short of length, outside off, Ervine pushes at it but the extra bounce takes the ball over the slip fielder

items.preText: Shawon: "Poor saifuddin! Hope this drop by mushi will not be costly "
items.text: length ball, around middle and off, defended
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: back of length around middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
length ball, just outside off, dabbed towards point for a single
length ball, just outside off, defended back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ervine, no run

items.preText:
Mahmudullah comes into the attack, around the wicket

Sheikh Saad sri: "The chance remains for zimbabwe is only the 'miracle'. Asking rate is high, wickets falling regularly.. let's see how quickly tigers can wrap up the match!"
items.text: length ball around middle and leg, defended
length ball, pushed through with the arm, Williams punches it towards mid-on
length ball, on the pads, played gently towards short fine leg, a bit of hesitation but completed comfortably in the end
length again, tucked away towards square leg for another single
length outside off stump, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
beaten! Length ball, angled in with the arm but held its line after pitching to beat the bat
length ball, on the pads, defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, 1 run

items.text: fuller on the pads, defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ervine, no run

items.text: length outside off, opens the face of the bat to collect a single to short third man
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Ervine, 1 run

items.text: length ball, punched off the back foot towards the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: length again, just outside off, pushed towards extra cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williams, no run

items.text: length ball, pitching just outside off and spinning sharply to beat the forward push
this one goes with arm, defended off the back foot

items.preText: tayaruka: "Only Jarvis and Chatara are not recognise as batsmen. Zimbabwe can bat to number 9 so one solid partnership anything can happen"
items.text: length ball, just outside off, pushed back towards the bowler
